familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president/member of Trump Old Post Office LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest.

Former president/director/chairman of Trump Old Post Office Member Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: Trump Old Post Office Member Corp.
